Praise and recognition are essential to an outstanding workplace and can boost employee`s engagement. The act of recognizing desired behavior increases the repetition of this behavior, and, therefore, productivity. An attitude of gratitude – this is not only a good rhyme, but also a great way to live, work and communicate. The usual \\\"thank you\\\" can improve well-being, create positive emotions, help maintain work-life balance and give the opportunity to recreate pleasant memories. its basic level, wellbeing is about personal happiness — feeling good, feeling healthy and working safely and productively. There are building blocks that enable flourishing: positive emotion, engagement, relationships, meaning, accomplishments, vitality. Each of these six building blocks contributes to well-being and is pursued for its own sake, not as a means to an end.
